alert.note: Alert for Melville Foothills; Northern Sweet Grass; Southern Wheatland (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued January 25 at 11:39PM MST until January 26 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Billings
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...West winds gusting up to 60 mph. * WHERE...Southern Wheatland, Melville Foothills and Northern Sweet Grass. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Strong crosswinds will make travel difficult along Highway 191 from Big Timber through Judith Gap. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Localized blowing and drifting snow is also possible.
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution and consider postponing travel until winds subside, or take an alternate route.

area.areaDesc: Melville Foothills; Northern Sweet Grass; Southern Wheatland
